nodes.text: Steve Thomas is a professional illustrator who provided several illustrations for the 2016 reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy.

Thomas worked for newspapers creating graphics and illustrations for 14 years, before before becoming a freelance illustrator/graphic artist. He has created marketing and advertising art for several companies and has created artwork for licenses as
Star Wars, Disney, Fox, Star Trek, Hasbro, The Muppets and Marvel.
